description: Speedscale helps engineers validate their code with real, sanitized traffic. We simulate realistic production conditions in Kubernetes so you no longer need to manually script or use large and complex environments. Catch performance defects before they reach production and reduce weeks-long test cycles down to a few days.

## Traffic replay for everyone
Adopt across engineering teams, most critical services first.
###### Step 01
###### Capture Data 
  * Agree to scope and system for lighthouse project.
  * Capture and validate inbound, outbound, data encryption, scalability, etc.


###### Step 02
###### Data analysis and model training
  * Create snapshots to test scenarios. What do we expect to happen and why?
  * Modify and transform snapshots to form snapshots to form better testing shape.


###### Step 03
###### Traffic replay and mock backends
  * Execute snapshots for load / functional / chaos scenarios.
  * Analyze results and refine as necessary.


###### Step 04
###### Adoption and scaling
  * In CI/CD.
  * Expand to other teams.


### Staging doesn’t always work
It’s tough to maintain and used by everyone. 
Use Speedscale to explore the environment specific to the APIs YOU care about, reduce your cloud bill and autogenerate mocks for just what you need.
[ Read more ](https://speedscale.com/</product/service-virtualization>)
![](https://speedscale.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/Group-626.png)
![](https://speedscale.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/Group-628.png)
### ...and you need test data
Link data insights directly to business performance for proactive decision-making. 
[ Read more ](https://speedscale.com/</product/service-virtualization/>)
### Get up and running quickly
Whether it’s our Kubernetes operator or Postman import — spinning up dev environments with realistic scenarios is quick and automated, in any cloud or even your laptop. 
[ Read more ](https://speedscale.com/<https:/docs.speedscale.com/quick-start/>)
![](https://speedscale.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/Logo_container.svg)
![](https://speedscale.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/image-generate-realistic.png)
### Generate realistic load on your laptop
Whether you’re looking to understand behavior under 2x or 10x production load, Speedscale can stress your systems based on real traffic patterns, every commit. Multiply or loop sanitized user traffic and find your throughput, latency, and breaking point. 
[ Read more ](https://speedscale.com/</product/load-testing>)
![](https://speedscale.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/Speedscale_LinesInvertY.svg)
### IHG Hotels & Resorts selects Speedscale as their “one-stop-shop” for test environments and data
[ Read more customer stories ](https://speedscale.com/</customers/cimpress>)
Case Study
![](https://speedscale.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/IHG-Hotels-Resorts-1.svg)
##### IHG Hotels & Resorts is a multinational hospitality company that manages over 6,000 hotels in 100 countries. Their diverse portfolio of properties includes leading brands like Holiday Inn, Kimpton, Crowne Plaza, Intercontinental Hotels, and more.
#### Challenge
IHG Hotels & Resorts launched a leadership initiative to enhance developer experience and productivity during their migration to Amazon Elastic Kubernetes Service (EKS). The focus was on scaling environments for load and functional testing to improve deployment speed and quality by removing developer roadblocks.
The team faced challenges with time-intensive setups using tools like Akamai CloudTest, ReadyAPI, and WireMock, along with large staging environments. These issues worsened as the number of test cases increased.
#### Solution
DK discovered Speedscale through a colleague’s recommendation, drawn by its “one-stop-shop” approach, consolidating load testing and API mocking into one tool. Its automated, traffic-driven testing eliminated manual processes, standardized workflows, and improved consistency.
###  “The Speedscale founders and core engineers all have a strong engineering background. They have the scar tissue from their past DevOps experiences, and it shows in how battle-tested and well-thought-out the Speedscale product is for developers.” 
**–Dinakar (DK) Machikalapudi, Head of Enterprise Services, Platforms, Support and DevSecOps**
### Cimpress reduces load testing time by 80% with Speedscale
[ Read more customer stories ](https://speedscale.com/</customers/cimpress>)
Case Study
![](https://speedscale.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/image-5.svg)
##### A global eCommerce company that produces custom marketing materials for small businesses. Millions of customers worldwide use their design and printing services to create business cards, signage, promotional items, stationary, gifts, and more.
#### Challenge
As Principal Software Engineer, Jeff Kwan leads a team of API engineers that manages the software and product data behind Cimpress’ expansive catalog.Jeff’s team had inherited legacy software from a different team and was looking to migrate off of it. He realized they needed a solution to test that the new software worked the same way as the old one. To describe the challenge he was facing
#### Solution
One year later, Jeff and his team report that they are incredibly pleased with their experience and the results they’ve achieved with Speedscale. He appreciates how open the Speedscale team is to receiving product feedback, and is excited to have his team trial some new features, like local desktop testing and auto-updating of web tokens.
###  Speedscale’s offering is really, really good. The products, especially Traffic Viewer and Diff Viewer, and the overall developer-centric experience are all very polished 
–Jeff Kwan

**Speedscale: Accelerating Development Through Realistic Simulations**  

Founded in 2020 and part of Y Combinator's Summer Batch S20, Speedscale, based in Atlanta, GA, is on a mission to streamline software development. With a small but spirited team of eight, the company addresses a common pain point for engineers: the complexity of testing in realistic production conditions.

Speedscale emerged with a clear vision: to help developers validate their code using actual, sanitized traffic. This means no more cumbersome manual scripting or navigating through large, chaotic environments—developers can now simulate production-like conditions in Kubernetes easily. By catching performance defects early, Speedscale trims weeks of testing down to just a few days.

### Key Offerings
Speedscale’s product suite caters to multiple use cases:
- **Local Development Environments**: Simulate API and database responses rapidly, eliminating delays caused by unreliable shared environments.
- **API Observability**: Gain insights into your APIs to ensure they perform as expected.
- **Load Testing**: Stress-test applications based on real traffic patterns to identify breaking points and optimize performance.
- **Legacy Software Migration**: Transition from old software with confidence, ensuring new implementations work as intended.

Their group partner, Gustaf Alstromer, adds value with experience, supporting their growth journey. The strategic focus on **developer tools**, **DevSecOps**, and **Kubernetes** positions Speedscale as a valuable player in the software development ecosystem.

### Why Speedscale?
Speedscale's innovative approach aids companies like IHG Hotels & Resorts and Cimpress in transforming their development processes. For instance, IHG adopted Speedscale to overcome the inefficiencies of large staging environments and improve deployment speeds. The result? A consolidated "one-stop-shop" for load testing and API mocking, boasting a streamlined, automated approach.

As the company continues to evolve, the emphasis remains on enhancing developer experiences, reducing costs, and increasing efficiency—all while holding true to their foundational mission of simulating realistic production environments.

For a deeper dive into their offerings and case studies, check out their [website](https://speedscale.com).
